commit.message:
Into ConnInstanceLoader I modified properties overriding to correct a little bug about skipping existing properties.
I made some modification into the console: overridden property is required if property schema is required.
Further, bean registration is required just for resources. Schema names retrieving is performed just instantiating a ConnectorFacadeProxy ad-hoc.

Fixes issue 153


git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/syncope/trunk@1247120 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
